summary: To go with my Gothic Dragonborn series
descriptionHtml:
By request of: RielleLynn, to make a retexture to better match my cultist retexture here is a gothic silver/blue black Miraak for your dark skyrim needs!

NMM

or

Manual: drag and drop the textures/meshes into your data folder

*Please do not reupload

My other mods:

Glorious Miraak [original golden version]: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31408/

Bloodskal as seen in the pictures: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31359/

Cultist Armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31362/
author: Zazil
